message.body: Hi love! I'm so sorry but I'm going to bail tonight, I've just been feeling really out of it all day and apparently need some rest...I will definitely be there next week though!
I hope you feel better! No worries about tonight! I'm going to try to go tomorrow (couldn't go last week; had to work late) if you want to join me!
Ah I would but we're driving up to pa right after work tmw! :-(
Bummer! Hopefully I'll see you next Thursday. Have a safe drive tomorrow!
Thank you! Hope it's a good class! And yes next thursday for sure! :-)
